subject: Re: Eugene Deployment Map changes
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Comments from my team in blue 




Move F#043 Chambers and Lorane Hwy to Chambers and 28th, catching the same direction of travel. (moved just north of 28th due to solar reasons)

Move F#017 Cal Young and Safeway to Cal Young just west of Willakenzie. (done)

Move F#002 Willamette and 10th to Willamette and 11th, catching westbound traffic. (We can relocate as requested if we can use ac power as there is no solar available. For now, left untouched. Please confirm if we can connect power to pole)

Move #045 Green Acres Rd @ N Delta Hwy EB to Coburg Road at Crescent looking westbound down Crescent. (done)

Move F#048 Hilyard Street @ E Amazon Drive EB to Fir Lane at River Road looking northbound (done)

Move F#027 Chambers Street @ West 6th Avenue NB to Chambers Street SB prior to West 2nd Avenue (done)

Move F#018 Hilyard Street @ Amazon Pkwy SB to West 6th Avenue at Madison Street catching WB West 6th. (Moved. May need private property permission. can you confirm if nearby light poles are city owned or DOT?)

 

Removed F041 Barger Drive @ W. Irwin Way EB and renumbered cameras accordingly. 

	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/d5e8833a-4a85-400e-b901--com 	 
Caroline Fraher
Account Executive

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/d5e8833a-4a85-400e-b901-e2dfe5e28ce5/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety

	Thank you! Sending to my team right now!

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0b93be0d-2b9d-48e2-861f-1c1b9fb4f808/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGY2LONNSWI2LOFZRW63JPMNXW24DBNZ4S6ZTMN5RWWLLTMFTGK5DZ/HFQWIMRQGQ4WIODDGFTDSM3EHFRDAYRXGEYWEMBUMRSDQNJWHA4TANJZGAYGEY3C/www-linkedin-com-company-flock-safety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0b93be0d-2b9d-48e2-861f-1c1b9fb4f808/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGS3TTORQWO4TBNUXGG33NF5TGY33DNNZWCZTFOR4S6===/MFTDKYZSGFTGMODGGBSTOYZUGZQTKMRUMU3GIMLGMU3WGYLCMRTGCZRSGI2DCNJV/www-instagram-com-flocksafety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0b93be0d-2b9d-48e2-861f-1c1b9fb4f808/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XGMYLDMVRG633LFZRW63JPMZWG6Y3LONQWMZLUPE======/MZRWCNBYGE4DSYZXGY3TIMBUG43GMZJZGJSWMYLDMFRTMZBSME2TGNBSGRRTGNRZ/www-facebook-com-flocksafety 

 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0b93be0d-2b9d-48e2-861f-1c1b9fb4f808/NB2HI4DTHIXS653XO4XHS33VOR2WEZJOMNXW2L3DF5DGY33DNNJWCZTFOR4Q====/GUYWIZBZMVRWMNBSGQ3WGMJZGZTDAZRUG5TDGNTFGMYDMNZXG5SGGNZYHAYTINBT/www-youtube-com-c-flocksafety 

https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0b93be0d-2b9d-48e2-861f--com 

 <https://gifo.srv.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/sc/0b93be0d-2b9d-48e2-861f--com 

	
 	 
	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/1XrlOmpdrQPY.png> 

	 <https://sales.flocksafety.com/t/102869/open/0b93be0d-2b9d-48e2-861f-1c1b9fb4f808.gif> 

	On Fri, Mar 14, 2025 at 7:38?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:
	

		Good morning,

		 

		We want to shift the following four cameras to better align with what we are looking to capture.

		 

		Move Chambers and Lorane Hwy to Chambers and 28th, catching the same direction of travel.

		Move Cal Young and Safeway to Cal Young just west of Willakenzie.

		Move Willamette and 10th to Willamette and 11th, catching westbound traffic.

		Move Green Acres Rd @ N Delta Hwy EB to Coburg Road at Crescent looking westbound down Crescent.

		Move Hilyard Street @ E Amazon Drive EB to Fir Lane at River Road looking northbound

		Move Chambers Street @ West 6th Avenue NB to Chambers Street SB prior to West 2nd Avenue

		Move Hilyard Street @ Amazon Pkwy SB to West 6th Avenue at Madison Street catching WB West 6th.

		 

		Remove F041 Barger Drive @ W. Irwin Way EB.  I think that puts us at the allotted 57.

		 

		Let me know if there are any issues with these movements.
		
		Derek

		 

		Detective D. DeWitt

		Financial Crimes Unit

		Special Weapons and Tactics Team

		Background Investigations Team

		Eugene Police Department

		300 County Club Road

		Eugene, OR 97401

		Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

		Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

		Work Cell � 541-743-6192
